datastructures

Class WordList

  • java.lang.Object
    • datastructures.WordList

  • public class WordList
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for storing words guaranteeing an almost constant access for :
    • contains()
    • insert()
    • remove()
    This class is synchronized.
    Author:
    Romain Mormont

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WordList()
      Construct an empty word list

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(java.lang.String word)
      Tests whether a word is in the list or not
      void insert(java.lang.String word)
      Inserts a new word in a WordList object.
      void remove(java.lang.String word)
      Removes a word from the list.
      int size()
      Returns the number of words in the list
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string containing each word of the list separated by a whitespaces
      java.lang.String toString(java.lang.String sep)
      Returns a string containing each word of the list separted by a character
      java.lang.String toString(java.lang.String sep, boolean sort)
      Returns a string containing each word of the list separted by a character

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • WordList

        public WordList()
        Construct an empty word list

    • Method Detail

      • insert

        public void insert(java.lang.String word)
        Inserts a new word in a WordList object. Does nothing if the word in already in the list.
        Parameters:
        word - the word to insert

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.lang.String word)
        Tests whether a word is in the list or not
        Parameters:
        word - the word searched in the list
        Returns:
        true if the list contains the word, false otherwise

      • remove

        public void remove(java.lang.String word)
        Removes a word from the list. Does nothing if the word is not in the list.
        Parameters:
        word - the word to remove

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string containing each word of the list separated by a whitespaces
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a String containing the list

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString(java.lang.String sep)
        Returns a string containing each word of the list separted by a character
        Parameters:
        sep - a String for separating each word
        Returns:
        a String containing the list

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString(java.lang.String sep,
                        boolean sort)
        Returns a string containing each word of the list separted by a character
        Parameters:
        sep - a String for separating each word
        sort - true if the list must be sorted, false otherwise
        Returns:
        a String containing the list

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number of words in the list
        Returns:
        the number of words in the list
